product.name: Arugula
product.description: Velvety with a peppery bite, our Arugula adds a courageous spice to any dish. Try it plain or with olive oil and lemon to experience its flavor in the purest form.

product.name: Arugula
product.description: Velvety with a peppery bite, our Arugula adds a courageous spice to any dish. Try it plain or with olive oil and lemon to experience its flavor in the purest form.

product.name: Baby Butter
product.description: With its sweet, buttery flavor and smooth texture, Baby Butter is a versatile green, making it the perfect base for any crisp salad.

product.name: Baby Kale
product.description: Baby Kale is harvested before it reaches the full maturity of an adult kale plant, so it carries the hearty flavor of its full-grown counterpart while providing a sweeter finish. It’s delicate enough for salads and smoothies, but also sturdy enough to hold up in hot dishes.

product.name: Baby Kale Mix
product.description: Baby Kale Mix cheers up any dish with hearty, sweet, and well-rounded flavor while boasting a range of colors.

product.name: Spring Mix
product.description: Sweet, zesty and versatile. That’s what you get when red, green, and romaine lettuces meet mustard greens in this classic blend.

product.name: Parsley
product.description: Parsley is used to top dishes and enrich stews all around the world. The herb’s bright, refreshing flavor balances nicely with heavier dishes, making it a great garnish for meats and pastas.

product.name: Mustard Frills
product.description: Our debut small batch green with big-time flavor is back and bringing the heat!

product.name: Mixed Greens
product.description: Subtly sweet, velvety texture, with the perfect amount of crunch—that’s the unmistakeable experience of Mixed Greens.

product.name: Crispy Leaf
product.description: Invigorate your palate with our crunchiest green yet, Crispy Leaf. Its delightfully crisp center and frilly edges add texture and a refreshing finish to any dish you dream up.

product.name: Cilantro
product.description: Also known as coriander, this citrusy, fragrant herb is a staple in many cuisines, often used to brighten flavors and counteract spices in dishes like curries and tacos.

product.name: Berries
product.description: Our berries are locally grown, available year-round, and unbelievably delicious. Now we’re not sure which one is better. It’s a problem we’re not complaining about.

product.name: Basil
product.description: Sweet, aromatic and inviting—there is a reason this herb is so popular around the world.

product.name: Spring Mix
